TopicTitle: Tracking Station Reverting To Level 0 when Leaving the VAB

Articles.Content:
I am trying to figure out an issue after I upgrade my Tracking Station to Level 1.  If i enter VAB and exit again the Tracking Station reverts back to Level 0.  Does anyone know what could be causing this.  I ahve been trying to diagnose what mod could be causing it but have had no luck.

Thanks in advance.
